answers.answer: When you're tired of writing code
Around 85% coverage, quality of the tests is important

helper.text: You should aim for good tests, with good coverage

questions.title: What are two ways to wait for async functions in tests?

helper.text: You have to either wait for a function to call back, or promise to await a response

answers.answer: When you want to trick the end-user

answers.anwwer: When you want to run a fake version of your website to test your navigation

answers.answer: When you want to test you database
When you want to test functionality, but want an implementation that's faster and less taxing

helper.text: You sometimes want to test how things work before you want to decide how to use it.

questions.title: What are the "cheapest" tests to write?

helper.text: Testing one thing is usually easier than testing many
